text:
The Forgebinders are a faction of the [[Sulatu]] dedicated to learning from the [[dao]] of [[Fernia]] (or, more frequently, from the [[azer]]s the dao dispatch to the Material Plane). The [[Sulat League]] may have pioneered the [[elemental binding]] techniques the Sulatu use today, but it's Forgebinder ingenuity that created [[firesled]]s and [[firebrass|orichalcum]]. Forgebinders have such an innate understanding of elemental binding that many can use [[wheels of wind and water|wheel of wind and water]] and related [[dragonmark focus item]]s without possessing the necessary [[dragonmark]].

Forgebinder communities are havens of scientific and engineering knowledge. Unlike the reclusive [[dao]], Forgebinder [[drow]] collaborate constantly about how best to refine their works.
title: Forgebinders
tooltip: faction of Sulatar drow who focus on arcane science and engineering
